Legacy Document

Important: The information in this document is obsolete and should not be used for new development.

Inside Macintosh: Advanced Color Imaging Reference /
Chapter 3 - ColorSync Manager Reference for Applications and Device Drivers

ColorSync Manager Functions

This section describes the functions defined for your application's use by the ColorSync Manager.

The functions are organized into the following categories:

  • accessing profiles (page 3-69)
  • accessing profile elements (page 3-85)
  • accessing named color profile values (page 3-99)
  • performing high-level, QuickDraw-specific color matching (page 3-104)
  • performing low-level color matching without QuickDraw (page 3-107)
  • embedding profiles and profile identifiers with QuickDraw (page 3-128)
  • assigning and accessing the system profile (page 3-131)
  • searching for profiles and profile identifiers (page 3-133)
  • converting between color spaces (page 3-143)
  • color matching with PostScript (page 3-158)
  • locating the ColorSync\x89 Profiles folder (page 3-164)
  • converting 2.x profiles to 1.0 format (page 3-166)
  • calling application-defined functions (page 3-166)
